title: Crowd Control Gaming(CCG) Looking for Manager
body:
Crowd Control Gaming(CCG) Storm Is looking for a manager to deal with scrims, timetables and deal with team conflict.
CCG has been involved in the eSports scene for almost 5 years and we would like to continue pushing for stronger results in league of legends.

To be filled in:


IGN:
Age:
Location:
Competitive Gaming Experience:
Management Experience:
Goals:
Team History:
Skype:
E-Mail:

You can also check us out and contact us:
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/CloudControlGaming/?fref=ts
E-Mail : crowdcontrolgaming10@gmail.com

replies.body: We will be taking our time picking anyone for this role.
